text: Nighthawks is a 1981 action thriller movie directed by Bruce Malmuth and stars Sylvester Stallone, Billy Dee Williams, Lindsay Wagner, Nigel Davenport, Rutger Hauer, and Robert Pugh. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1981 action movies Category:1981 crime thriller movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies set in Paris Category:Movies set in New York City
title: Nighthawks (1981 movie)
